title: The Layers of Freesia
description: Konrad Eberstark is a successful businessman and a well-known collector. He has money and power, but he’s restless, unable to settle down. A painful incident in his past has left him cold and suspicious toward every woman he encounters.When he finally chooses to marry weird and quiet Faye Lewis, their problems don’t disappear. On the contrary — Konrad still can’t let go of old doubts and irrational anger, so it might be impossible for him to build a future with the woman he loves and not to lose her permanently because of his insecurities. Faye loves him, but everyone has their limits.NOTE: This edition is no longer available. For a new one, please see here https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/4...
author: K.S. Morgan
